item.title: Dragon Ball: The Breakers Season 8 launches February 28
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/dragon-ball-the-breakers-season-8-launches-february-28

  • PC
  • PS4
  • Switch
  • Xbox One

Golden Frieza joins the fray.

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer Dimps will release the eighth season of content for Dragon Ball: The Breakers on February 28, the companies announced. It will add new Raider Golden Frieza.

Here are the first details:

Dragon Ball: The Breakers is available now for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

Season 8 Raider Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Care Bears: To The Rescue for PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, and Xbox One launches March 6
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/care-bears-to-the-rescue-for-ps5-xbox-series-ps4-and-xbox-one-launches-march-6

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Currently available for Switch and PC.

Publisher Forever Entertainment and developer Polygoat will release side-scrolling action platformer Care Bears: To The Rescue for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One on March 6 for $14.99 / €14.99, the companies announced.

Care Bears: To The Rescue first launched for Switch and PC via Steam and GOG on October 24, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Forever Entertainment:

About

Get ready to embark on a heartwarming journey with the Care Bears in Care Bears: To The Rescue!

The Silver Lining is in danger! The Care Bears are on a mission to save their home world from Bluster’s untamable giant Bad Seed! They need your help to collect enough caring energy through a variety of colorful and varied levels.

A wide array of challenges await you: avoid obstacles barring your way, help your friends, take to the sky with the Care Plane and heal foes corrupted by the Bad Seed’s influence. Make use of the Care Bears belly badge powers to restore peace and harmony!

Care Bears: To The Rescue can be played in single-player mode or local mode with up to four players! Each Care Bear has a unique ability to take advantage from! Whether it’d be Funshine Bear’s unmatched speed, Cheer Bear’s powerful belly badge power, or Grumpy Bear’s knack for finding hidden collectibles, the choice is yours!

Key Features

  • Diverse Worlds – Explore different themed worlds, each with its own set of obstacles, enemies, and unique visual identity. From the icy landscapes to the beach’s calming waves.
  • Unique Character Abilities! – Each Care Bear has a special ability for you to choose from:
    • Funshine Bear – Can move faster and avoid obstacles more efficiently.
    • Share Bear – Is able to regenerate health for anyone nearby, keeping the team in top shape!
    • Cheer Bear – Is equipped with a stronger belly badge power, allowing her to heal corrupted enemies more quickly.
    • Good Luck Bear – Has a chance of avoiding damage altogether, adding a layer of unpredictability to encounters.
    • Grumpy Bear – Can detect hidden stickers when nearby.
  • Unique Belly Badge Powers – Use each Care Bear’s special abilities to overcome obstacles, unlock secret pathways, and heal enemies. Create rainbow bridges, activate old machinery or lighten up dark paths!
  • Engaging Multiplayer Mode – Play with friends and family in local multiplayer mode. Work together to combine belly badge powers for greater effects and bring teammates back into the action with cooperative gameplay mechanics.
  • Collectibles and Replayability – Gather caring energy and collectible stickers throughout levels. Collectible stickers feature details of characters, locations and items from Care Bear’s rich lore.
  • Challenging Mini-Games – After completing each world, face a unique mini-game that ties into the story!
  • Accessible Gameplay – For younger or less seasoned players, an “Easy Mode” is available, allowing them to enjoy the game without worrying about losing health points.

Care Bears: To The Rescue is not just about bringing back joy and harmony! As you progress, the Care Bears will also be tasked with freeing the inhabitants of the Silver Lining from the Bad Roots’ clutches!

Prepare to save the day and rescue the Silver Lining in Care Bears: To The Rescue. Whether you’re a long-time fan or new to the Care Bears universe, a unique and magical experience awaits you!

Watch a new trailer below.

PlayStation and Xbox Release Date Trailer
